definition: the act of dividing or partitioning, separate or apportion into sections
details:
noun
- the act of dividing or partitioning
= synonyms: partitioning, segmentation, sectionalization, sectionalisation
- a vertical structure that divides or separates (as a wall divides one room from another)
= synonyms: divider
- (anatomy) a structure that separates areas in an organism
- (computer science) the part of a hard disk that is dedicated to a particular operating system or application and accessed as a single unit
verb
- separate or apportion into sections
= example: separate or apportion into sections
= synonyms: zone
- divide into parts, pieces, or sections
= example: divide into parts, pieces, or sections
= synonyms: partition off
